member.name: M:GCDAlgorithm.CalculationOfGCD.PrepareDataForHistogram(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Method preparing data for building histograms.
member.param: Parameters for calculating the GCD. The minimum number of parameters is two, and the maximum is 4.
member.returns: Returns a boolean expression. Where: true is prepared; false isn't prepeared.
